thread.title: Manchester United Fans Did Not Appreciate Club's 'Goal Of The Day'
thread.title_full: Manchester United Fans Did Not Appreciate Club's 'Goal Of The Day'

title: Manchester United Fans Did Not Appreciate Club's 'Goal Of The Day'

organizations.name: manchester united fans did not appreciate club

text:
Manchester United Fans Did Not Appreciate Club's 'Goal Of The Day' Sat Feb 04 2017 22:14:22  14:22 GMT+0000 (GMT) Josh Lawless Josh Lawless in football 
Manchester United travel to the King Power Stadium tomorrow to play Champions Leicester City and is normal before a game, the club looked to get in the mood in the build-up to the game by posting clips of memorable goals against their upcoming opponents on social media. 
Their pick today was Angel Di Maria's delightful chip in a game that ended 5-3 to Leicester. 
The goal is still wonderfully mesmeric to watch but with the way Di Maria's United career turned out, a good chunk of fans don't want to see the sight of him and that came across strongly in the replies to.
